content: To cover the Argonaut imaging ordering use case, and also for general updates like R4 support, I've created a "PAMA at 2019-09 Connectathon" milestone in the sandbox issue tracker. Of these 14 issues, I've marked 10 as must-have for successful connectathon testing. Would love feedback + help fleshing this out (thanks for seeding this set of ideas @Dennis Patterson).
@Nikolai Schwertner can you help me understand what behavior https://api.hspconsortium.org/cdshooksdstu2/open has that's different from the default (non "cdshooksdstu2") HSPC endpoints?
(Since I see this is the default FHIR API server for the Sandbox.)
@Josh Mandel I don't believe there is anything special in the behavior of this sandbox vs any other HSPC sandbox. @Shilpy Sharma @Jacob Crump - can you confirm?

Yes, this endpoint runs through the same api as any of the other sandboxes so it has the same behavior as any other sandbox. The only difference would be the data that is stored in that particular sandbox.
